**Steps and Required Documents for Renewing a Driver's License:**
1. Go to the relevant traffic unit according to your address as listed on your national ID card. 2. Submit a copy of your national ID card and present the original for verification. 3. Fill out Form 256 (driver’s license application form). 4. Submit a copy of your graduation certificate and present the original. 5. Undergo a medical examination to obtain a certificate of good vision and internal health. 6. Submit four recent passport-size photos with a white background. 7. Submit a stamped medical certificate from a hospital confirming good vision and no internal diseases. 8. Submit the license renewal file from the relevant traffic department. 9. Submit a certificate of clearance (no traffic violations). 10. Pay the required fees and have your photo taken at the traffic unit. 11. Receive the renewed driver’s license.
**Driver's License Renewal Fees for 2025:**
1. • The renewal fee for a private driver's license starts at 1,105 EGP for applicants with no traffic violations.
**Detailed Steps to Renew a Private Driver’s License:**
1. Obtain a traffic violation certificate (50 EGP + violation fees). 2. Undergo a medical examination at the traffic unit (300 EGP). 3. Purchase the application form (125 EGP). 4. Take the driver’s license photo at the photo booth. 5. Submit all required documents at the designated window. 6. Pay 630 EGP in taxes via Visa. 7. Submit the tax payment receipt and send the file to the printing unit. 8. Receive the renewed driver’s license.
**Requirements for Renewing a Driver's License:**
1. Submit a drug test certificate issued by competent authorities. 2. • The applicant must not have a final conviction involving moral turpitude or dishonesty.
